title: Statement by the Press Secretary – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
January 12, 2018
The Donald J. Trump Administration is pleased that China is sharply reducing its trade with North Korea.  This action supports the United States-led global effort to apply maximum pressure until the North Korean regime ends its illicit programs, changes its behavior, and moves toward denuclearization of the Korean peninsula.
